Power Supply to the Module

For the Talaria TWO module, input voltage source V_3.3V should be powered with a 3.3V +/- 10% tightly regulated power supply. Power supply source should be able to supply 300mA peak current. Considering other components on the board, a suitable DC-DC regulator should be chosen.

It is important to have decoupling capacitors placed close to the modules’ power pins VCC and GND as depicted in Figure 1.

Figure 1: Decoupling Capacitors on VCC pins 2 and 3 VCC and GND pins 1 and 4
